title: 2025 in Saudi Arabia - Wikipedia
snippet: 17 November – 2025 Medina bus crash: A bus carrying Indian pilgrims undertaking Umrah catches fire near Medina, killing 45 of the 46 people on board. 1 December – Saudi Arabia and Russia sign an agreement on mutual visa exemption for each other's citizens.

title: Lenovo Strengthens Strategic Commitment to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia with Senior Leadership Appointments and Regional Headquarters in Riyadh - Lenovo StoryHub
snippet: Lenovo announced the appointment of its executive leadership team for Saudi Arabia, marking a key milestone in the company’s regional growth strategy and its plans to establish Regional Headquarters (RHQ) in Riyadh.
